DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate change of cerebral glucose metabolism by donepezil therapy and to associate change of glucose metabolism and symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Donepezil Therapy and Changes of Symptoms and Glucose Metabolism in Patients With Dementia With Lewy Bodies (DLB)
